section1-subtitle: We create unique brands for your Minecraft projects
section2-content: CSSM Group is a creative branding agency specializing in developing unique identities for Minecraft projects. Our team consists of experienced designers, developers, and gamers who combine their passion for Minecraft with a professional approach to branding.
team-member1-description: His strength lies in generating unique ideas that always go beyond the ordinary.
team-member2-description: His strength lies in seeing potential in every project and turning it into reality through a creative approach.
portfolio-morf: Development of a unique identity for a Minecraft machinima community.
portfolio-newland: Development of a logo, graphic design and tagline for a multiplayer server project for Minecraft.
portfolio-hesk: Translation into Ukrainian of software for documentation and technical support.
portfolio-fyennyi: Complete media rebranding, including development of business strategy, logo and brand identity for Minecraft mobile browser.
section6-content: Ready to turn your Minecraft project into a real brand? Let’s talk!
footer-description: Creative branding agency for Minecraft projects
footer-address: Address: 78 Tsentral'na Street, Berezivka, Vinnytsia Oblast, Ukraine, 24442
